document_data.caption: A yarting available from [[Aurora's Emporium]].
document_data.name: Yarting
document_data.mainbody: A '''yarting''' was a stringed instrument, similar to a [[wikipedia:en:Guitar|guitar]], common to [[Amn]] and [[Calimshan]].<ref name=FRCS3e-p22 />
document_data.Description:
Yartings were widespread among [[bard]]s across [[Faer√ªn]], and many variations of the instrument existed.

Various sizes of yartings were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
